Item.Title: I RULE ROASTERS
Item.Description: Delicious, slow-cooked meals made with meat or poultry in savory gravy.

Item.Title: NOW YOU\'RE BARKIN\' CUTS
Item.Description:
Made with real meat or poultry and smothered in delicious gravy to deliver
a meaty meal.

Item.Title: GO GETTER GRILLERS
Item.Description: Tempting your dog's senses with the aroma, look, and flavor of real meat.

Item.Title: BOSS DOG DINNERS
Item.Description: Finely ground, delicious meals made with real meat or poultry. Your dog will love this classic meaty variety.

Item.Title: SENIOR DINNER
Item.Description: A delicious and tender mix with chicken and rice, formulated to meet the nutritional needs of senior dogs.

Item.Title: MY WAY MEATY DINNERS
Item.Description: Made with high-quality ingredients, exhilarating tastes, and captivating aromas.

Item.Title: VARIETY PACKS
Item.Description: Mighty Dog<sup>®</sup> Variety Packs are available in 12-can, 12-pouch, and 24-can packs.
